actions.text: Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution providing for the printing of the revised edition of the Rules and Manual of the House of Representatives for the One Hundred First Congress.

summary.text: Provides for the printing of a revised edition of the Rules and Manual of the House of Representatives for the 101st Congress as a House document. Authorizes the printing of additional copies of such document for the use of the House.

titles.title: A resolution providing for the printing of the revised edition of the Rules and Manual of the House of Representatives for the One Hundred First Congress.
